price: Ante Dios han de comparecer y Él es sobre toda cosa poderoso".
arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
